courses.title: Singalong Pirate Hits
courses.description: In this course you'll learn how to sing all-time favourite pirate songs without sounding like you actually know the words or how to hold a note.

courses.title: Avoiding Brawls While Drinking as Much Rum as You Desire
courses.description: Every good pirate loves rum, but it also has a tendency to get you into trouble.  In this course you'll learn how to avoid that.  This new exclusive edition includes an additional chapter on how to run fast without falling while drunk.

courses.title: Commandeering a Ship Without Getting Caught
courses.description: Commandeering a ship in rough waters isn't easy.  Commandeering it without getting caught is even harder.  In this course you'll learn how to sail away and avoid those pesky musketeers.

courses.title: Overthrowing Mutiny
courses.description: In this course, the author provides tips to avoid, or, if needed, overthrow pirate mutiny.
